definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Mother will be expecting me, and getting uneasy.
sentences.chinese: 母亲一定会盼望盼得心神不安。

sentences.english: There, awaiting my uneasy embrace, are some five or six skateboards .
sentences.chinese: 那里，五六块轮滑板，正等候我心神不安的拥抱。

sentences.english: I was disturbed about the bad news.
sentences.chinese: 对于这坏消息，我感到心神不安。

sentences.english: I was disturbed to hear the bad news.
sentences.chinese: 对于这坏消息，我感到心神不安。

sentences.english: Weeks after the accident she remained distraught.
sentences.chinese: 事故过去几周了，可她仍是心神不安。

sentences.english: She had been perturbed by the premature announcement of his engagement.
sentences.chinese: 她由于他过早地宣布婚约而心神不安。

sentences.english: Uneasy is the head, however, that wears the crown.
sentences.chinese: 但是，心神不安地是头佩戴冠。

sentences.english: I am very uncomfortable and uneasy about my emotion to you.
sentences.chinese: 我是非常难受和心神不安的关于我的情感对您。

sentences.english: She was disturbed to hear about her mother's sudden illness.
sentences.chinese: 她获悉母亲得急病后感到心神不安。

sentences.english: His heart did not understand, why have gold, since one would be so uneasy.
sentences.chinese: 他心里不理解，为啥有了黄金，自个会这么心神不安。

sentences.english: And I have an uneasy feeling he had something there.
sentences.chinese: 我对他的表现有种心神不安的感觉。

definition: shaking in fear/one's heart palpitating with fear
lit. heart distracted, thoughts in turmoil (idiom); distraught with anxiety
